disease: Other specified malignant neoplasm of skin of unspecified eyelid, including canthus

physical_findings: Skin lesion on eyelid or canthus

required: Histopathological confirmation of malignant neoplasm of skin
supportive: Location of lesion on eyelid or canthus

differential_diagnoses: Malignant neoplasm of skin of genital organs (C51-C52, C60.-, C63.2)
Malignant neoplasm of connective tissue of eyelid (C49.0)
